name: Tesco 2 Boneless Salmon Fillets 270G
description: Succulent salmon fillets, responsibly sourced from Scotland or Norway, and a
source of omega 3. Bake topped with pesto and sliced tomato then serve simply
with a crisp salad, or find more recommended recipes at www.tesco.com/realfood.
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Oven><Temperature F="375°F" G="Gas 5" C="190°C" /><Time>18-23 minutes</Time><Instructions>Remove all packaging.Place on a baking tray wrapped in lightly oiled foil to form a loose parcel, in the centre of a pre-heated oven at 190°C/Fan 170°C°F/Gas Mark 5 for 18-23 minutes.</Instructions></Oven><Microwave><Item23 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave><Barbeque /><Grill /><Shallow_Fry /><Deep_Fry /><Stir_Fry /><Steam /><Poach /><Hob /><Boil_In_The_Bag /><Oven_From_Frozen><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven_From_Frozen><Microwave_From_Frozen><Item24 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave_From_Frozen><Cooking_Precautions>Not suitable for cooking from frozen.All appliances vary these are guidelines only.Check food is piping hot throughout before serving.</Cooking_Precautions></Cooking_Instructions><Freezing_Instructions><Freezing_Guidelines>Suitable for home freezing. Freeze on day of purchase. Use within one month.</Freezing_Guidelines><Defrosting>Defrost thoroughly for a minimum of 10 hours in the refrigerator.IMPORTANT: If food has thawed, do not refreeze.Follow the preparation guidelines above.</Defrosting></Freezing_Instructions><Recipes>Name of recipe suggestionIngredients:Method:To Serve:</Recipes>
PromotionDescription: 50 extra points on any Tesco Finest meat or fish
